ygData.subject: Re: Where are the Minotaur Axes?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think  I was misunderstood, I wouldn t suggest fighting minotaurs at lvl 6. You could take Orc Cent.s in Crushbone, but I d steer clear of Minotaurs for a
ygData.messageBody:
I think I was misunderstood, I wouldn't suggest fighting minotaurs at lvl
6. You could take Orc Cent.s in Crushbone, but I'd steer clear of
Minotaurs for a few levels yet. I just meant you should go and buy an axe
from a player. I was trying to give background on where they came from.


On Fri, 28 May 1999, Chris wrote:

> From: Chris <drtns@...>
>
> On Fri, 28 May 1999, King, Darrin wrote:
>
> > From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
> >
> > *Hello,
> > *I'm a sixth level Paladin running solo around Freeport. Can
> > *anybody tell
> > *me where you get the Minotaur Axes I keep hearing about? With
> > *my limited
> > *funds, it seems like I'll be stuck with a rusty scimitar or
> > *sword for life!
> > * Thanks!
> >
> > The easier minotaurs are in the minotaur caves in the Steamfont zone, which
> > is on the other continent, Faydwer. But, they aren't "easy" by any means at
> > 6th level; I wouldn't try them solo.
> >
> > There used to be lesser minotaurs in Beholder, a.k.a. the Gorge of Grobb,
> > over by Runnyeye and Misty Thicket, by Rivervale, but now I hear there are
> > only those very tough minotaurs :(
> >
>
> Most Mino Axes run about 4pp in the Kelethin/Steamfont area, as stated above
> they are from the Mino Caves in Steamfont, if you want to get one the cheap
> way i.e. go kill a Mino yourself I must stress the need for a group, as well
> a Cleric would be important mainly for their cure disease. In Steamfont
> there are diseased rats that LOVE to attack you when your in combat with
> something else, this rat Disease lasts for about 30 mins (REAL TIME) and
> during that time you will be realy hurting for HP's as I understand it you
> won't regen HP during combat while diseased, and your max HP is choped, so
> even when you heal your still in bad shape... The Rats are passive until
> your fighting something else then they will join in. Another thing to worry
> about is the Mino Hero who will just come out every once and a while to kill
> anyone in sight :) he will KOS and I have watched him take out the Gnome
> guards so at level 6, RUN if you hear of him being out in your area, or if
> you see him.
>
> I just ran through Beholder Maze last night on my way to quenos, I am a
> level 11 High Elf Paladin, there were many Cavern Mino's walking around
> they coned QUITE RED to me... so you would best avoid them unless your in a
> Major group.
>
>
> --
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>
